# File lib/gherkin/parser/filter_listener.rb, line 18
      def initialize(listener, filters)
        @listener = listener
        @filter_method = detect_filter(filters)
        
        @meta_buffer = []
        @feature_buffer = []
        @scenario_buffer = []
        @examples_buffer = []
        @examples_rows_buffer = []

        @feature_tags = []
        @scenario_tags = []
        @example_tags = []

        @table_state = :step
      end
